resources.string:
This app will help you to manage your monthly income to achieve a successful life in the future.

Input your salary, tap the SUBMIT button, and you will see the allocation divisions of your monthly income.
You can choose three options to see the maximum allocation per MONTH, per WEEK, or per DAY.

It's inspired from the concept of wealth management created by Li Ka Shing, the richest man in Asia. He teaches us how to separate our income into FIVE different allocations:
DAILY NEEDS, SOCIAL LIFE, LEARN and STUDY, LEISURE and TRAVEL, INVESTMENT and SAVINGS
Strict budgeting plays an important role in this. Eat simply. Prioritize your needs and lessen your wants. If you can, you can also downsize your needs.

Network yourself with people who are more knowledgeable, richer or people who have helped you in your career. Do a favor for them once in a while like treating them in lunch or dinner or work for them for free.
Set aside also to improve yourself by buying and reading books and attending seminars. Aside from improving your skills, meeting people in these seminars are also part of the investment.

Set aside 10% for travel at least once a year. Traveling need not to be expensive. Stay in simple hotels or dorm-type hostels to save costs. Use those experiences to recharge yourself so that youâ€™ll continually have passion in your work.

Use it for investments like mutual funds, UITFs, bonds, stock market, real estate, etc. Remember that as you earn more, invest more so that you will not run out of money and quality of life will not drastically go down.
